questions.Instruccion: Match the pictures with the sentences.

questions.question: Recycling 1 soda can saves the energy to power a television for 3 hours.
Recycling 1 glass bottle saves the energy to power a computer for 25 minutes.
Recycling 1 plastic bottle saves the energy to power a light bulb for 3 hours. Americans throw away 25,000,000 plastic bottles per hour on average!
To make all the paper we need in the world, we cut down 4 billion trees a year!
The average person throws away 74kg of food waste each year. This is the same as 1077 banana skins.
Things made of plastic, like plastic supermarket bags and bottles that end up in our oceans kill approximately 1,000,000 sea animals every year.
We throw away a lot of food. For example: 1.3 million unopened yogurts each day and 600,000 thousand whole uncooked eggs every day. What a waste!

questions.Instruccion: Drag the conversation in the correct order.

questions.question: Billy: where is the aquarium, dad?
Dad: I don't know, Billy. Let's ask this police officer. Excuse me,Sir. How do we get to the city aquarium?
Officer: That's easy, Walk along this street to the traffic lights and turn right into May road.
Dad: Into what road?
Officer: May Road. Then walk two blocks along May Road and the aquarium is on your left.
Dad: Oh! is it across from the zoo?
Officer: Yes, it is! You can't miss it!
